original_text: And the Lord said unto Joshua, Stretch out the spear that is in thy hand toward Ai; for I will give it into thine hand. And Joshua stretched out the spear that he had in his hand toward the city.
korean_text: 여호와께서 여호수아에게 이르시되 네 손에 잡은 단창을 들어 아이를 가리키라 내가 이 성읍을 네 손에 넘겨 주리라 여호수아가 그의 손에 잡은 단창을 들어 그 성읍을 가리키니

sentences.original_text: And the Lord said unto Joshua
Stretch out the spear that is in thy hand toward Ai
sentences.korean_translation: 네 손에 있는 창을 아이를 향하여 뻗으라

sentences.original_text: for I will give it into thine hand
And Joshua stretched out the spear
that he had in his hand toward the city
sentences.korean_translation: 그 손에 가진 것을 그 성읍을 향하여
